attributes.action: instruct Inland Revenue to investigate tax evasion by MP's how have "Flipped" second home expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a national scandal that "Flipping" has not resulted in arrest for tax evasion.  Regardless of paying back the tax evaded this would result in prosecution of the masses.  So why are MP's avoiding this?

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
